# How to Cite

## APA 
TerraHidro Team. (2025). *TerraHidro Manual* (Version 5.2.0) [Bookdown manual]. INPE. URL

> Optional (with access date):  
> TerraHidro Team. (2025). *TerraHidro Manual* (Version 5.2.0) [Bookdown manual]. INPE. URL (accessed Month Day, Year)

## BibTeX
```bibtex
@manual{TerraHidroManual2025,
  title        = {TerraHidro Manual},
  author       = {{TerraHidro Team}},
  organization = {INPE},
  year         = {2025},
  edition      = {Version 5.2.0},
  url          = {https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13N77EyJcHiL1u6audwLgqXoTl1mJD-bG},
  note         = {Bookdown manual}
}
```
